scripts.build: rimraf ./dist && npm run build:chrome && npm run build:firefox
scripts.build:chrome: parcel build manifest.json --target=chrome --no-source-maps && cd dist/chrome && node ../../lib/convert.mjs --chrome && cd ../..
scripts.build:firefox: parcel build manifest.json --target=firefox --no-source-maps && cd dist/firefox && node ../../lib/convert.mjs --firefox && cd ../..
